boardgame.name: Dark Souls: The Board Game
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dark Souls board game is a brutally hard exploration miniatures game for 1-4 players. Prepare to die._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game features a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;fast set-up, long reveal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mechanism that gets you into the game quickly and builds the location as you explore. The sense of danger is palpable as you discover new locations and the monsters that inhabit these dark places. The core combat mechanism and enemy behavior system forces deep strategic play and clever management of stamina to survive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dark Souls includes numerous boss and mini-boss encounters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; including one against the Dragon Slayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and utilizes an innovative behavior mechanism so that no two encounters are ever the same, thus giving the game near infinite replayability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Hey guys, due to the increased shipping by Steamforged Games I am offering my pledge for sale. Here is how it works: The backerkit is open till 07.12.2016. If you buy the pledge from me I will send you the link to the backerkit I received. It contains the basic 80GBP pledge ... from there you need to pay shipping (depending on your location in the world) and can buy addons and decide for the language. This offer contains: SOULS PLEDGE: Dark Souls™ - The Board Game + All Applicable Stretch Goals. The game is available in: English French Spanish German Italian The game is supposed to ship in March 2017 and the addons in October 2017. Price is 80 GBP * 1,37 (Conversion rate back when I pledged) + BGG Commission + Paypal fees = 120€ This offer is only valid until the pledgemanager closes, which is currently the beginning of december 2016, but might get extended (Steamforged Games is still undecided on this). For more questions, either have a look at the Kickstarter directly (https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/steamforged/dark-soulstm-the-board-game/description) or message me. I am doing this not to make a profit but due the increased shipping rate.

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Dark Souls is expected to arrive from the publisher in Q2, 2017. This listing is for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;SOULS_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Kickstarter Pledge. Includes the Core Game and all stretch goals. Shipping to be determined when the game arrives from the publisher.

Hy guys, I am selling my Dark Souls Basegame. I have a complete pledge but since the expansions are to be delivered later this year, I am selling THE BASEGAME ONLY. If you are interested in buying the complete pledge and are either willing to wait or pay shipping 2 times,please contact me andI will put up a new offer on the market and send you the link. Payment accepted either Paypal or Bank transfer (Überweisung). Shipping costs depend on location. I will ship via DHL, the box is measured 35cm x 35cm x 15cm and weights ~3.5 kg, if you want to look up the shipping costs. If you have other questions, feel free to ask me :-) Best regards, Aerouge

Hello Boardgamers. I´m selling the German Basegame Version of the Dark Souls Boardgame. Cards are all shrinkwraped and originally packed. Minatures never opened Only the Tokens are punched out(in a Zipbag) but erverthing is brand new. Shipping only in Germany via DHL 5,99€. Payment via Paypal or Bank Transfer Hallo Brettspieler/innen. Ich verkaufe meine Version von Dark Souls (Basisspiel). Das Spiel ist Neu und in einem Super Zustand. Die Figuren wurden nie geöffnet. Die Karten sind alle original verpacked. Nur die Tokens wurden rausgedrückt und sind einem Zippbeutel. Versand nur in Deutschland via DHL 5,99€. Bezahlung über Paypal oder Banküberweisung Viel Spaß beim spielen.

Kickstarter Souls Pledge w/ base game and stretch goals. Base game NIS, in hand. Stretch goals to arrive in wave 2. Shipping for base likely around $25 via FedEx. I should be able to change the shipping address for wave 2 to save any further shipping charges on the stretch goals.

This is the kickstarter copy of Dark Souls: The Board Game. It is in like new condition and has been played once. All miniatures are intact and look great. Kickstarter stretch goals have not shipped yet. They are scheduled to ship to backers in October. I will ship the stretch goals to you for free once they are available. I will ship the base game within 24 hours of receiving payment via FedEx ground with tracking and insurance for a flat $15 to continental US addresses. The stretch goals will ship for free once I have them. If you live outside the US, have a military address, or live in Alaska or Hawaii, please contact me for a shipping estimate first. PayPal is the preferred method of payment. Please contact me first if you would like to use a different payment method.
Brand new, never opened. Kickstarter edition!
Just the base game Only shrinkwrap removed to look at the miniatures. So (like) new.

For Sale: The Wave 2 shipping contents of my Dark Souls the Board Game Kickstarter pledge*. It will be redirected via the backerkit to your shipping address** upon payment, with all future kickstarter updates forwarded to your email address. *(This does not include the base game, which has already shipped. If interested, that can be arranged in a separate transaction)* **(Only available for persons in the continental US)** For kickstarter backers, these are all on schedule to ship this October! At retail, these will be split up and sent out month by month, so if you weren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t able to back, some of these won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be available to you until next year. Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s locked into my pledge, and included in the sale on this page: Mega Boss Expansions - The Four Kings Qty: 1 x £28.00 Mega Boss Expansions - Vordt of the Boreal Valley Qty: 1 x £28.00 Double Sided Gaming Tiles Qty: 1 x £15.00 Darkroot Basin Expansion Qty: 1 x £35.00 Mega Boss Expansions - Asylum Demon Qty: 1 x £28.00 Mega Boss Expansions - The Guardian Dragon Qty: 1 x £28.00 Mega Boss Expansions - Black Dragon Kalameet Qty: 1 x £28.00 Mega Boss Expansions - The Gaping Dragon Qty: 1 x £28.00 + All the Stretch Goals (Which includes the following pictured content + the Solaire Mini: http://i.imgur.com/RemcfNH.jpg ) This, plus the flat rate £24 shipping, amounts to £242, which is about 310 US Dollars ($310 is the total price for this sale. There is no additional shipping cost as implied by default on the Geek Market Item Description Box. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s already included in the pledge.) Having just had a new baby, I need diapers more than Dark Souls_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s mountain of content. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to purchase my pledge, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m accepting payment via paypal. When you pay, include YOUR NAME and continental US SHIPPING ADDRESS. Within 12 hours of payment and receiving of your address, the backerkit will be set to your information. I will send confirmation information, and forward additional kickstarter related emails to your email address, should you like to supply it, though private messages via BGG would be another option. This is my first transaction on BGG, but I hope to use the market to add some buyer/seller safety. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to examine my numerous buyer/seller feedbacks in other forums, I also go by Polioliolio on neogaf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s gaming community forum for buying/selling. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve also done buying/selling on Nintendoage.com where you can also look up my username, Polioliolio. My ebay feedback is under the name squall987. All are 100% positive feedback. *As with all kickstarters, I ask you to visit the official campaign page for Dark Souls the Board Game, read the details, and understand the possibility of delay or other setbacks related to kickstarter backed projects in general. However, in the latest emails, everything is on schedule for the US territory regarding Wave 2 shipment!* Thanks for your interest!
Unsealed, but never played. All components in original packaging. Includes all Kickstarter exclusive items from the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Souls Pledge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

Please note item may smell of cigarette smoke. I cannot tell myself due to a nasal condition but have had feedback on one of my sales that it did. Postage and packing £11 in UK via Royal Mail (fully insured). Message me for a quote if you would prefer a different delivery provider. Payment by Paypal or bank transfer.
For Rolando Cruz Only.

For Sale: Dark Souls the Board Game (English Edition) Like New: Opened, Never Played! Details: I opened this game in anticipation of playing when all the expansions arrived, but decided to sell my pledge for the upcoming expansions (of which I went in over my head), so I no longer need this base game. I organized each enemy/boss cards into their own baggies, sleeved the Large cards, didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even open the plastic seal on the smaller items cards, and organized all the tokens into baggies. The tiles and player boards are punched and ready to go. The minis are still encased in the plastic encasement they arrived in. This game is virtually brand new, and again, never played. Accepting Paypal, and will ship anywhere within the continental US, with tracking. $80 dollars + $15 shipping = $95 Dollaroos and you can be playing within the week!

This is for the souls pledge and all stretch goals ! Also comes with darkroot basin and 4 kings mega boss expansion .. shipping in base game 25$ if there is a difference in price I will refund it .. the stretch goals and expansion I will switch my address for yours in the pledge manager so you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have to pay shipping twice .. as far as I know steam forge plans to ship the stretch goals in October ..

Notes Dark Souls standard pledge from the Kickstarter. I only have the core game as of now but when you purchase this we will change the shipping address to whatever you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like (and they currently state you will not be charged for the shipping of stretch goal material). I opened the box and went through everything (punched stuff) but haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t played the game. Note: there was a small dent in the bottom left hand corner of the lower part of the box that was noted when I opened the shipping package. I would be okay with venmo as a payment option, and would prefer it over PayPal, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll accept PayPal.
This game has been played once and is in excellent condition. I will ship via usps, ups or fed ex at my discretion. Based on size and weight, shipping will be $20.

Price includes sales tax for germany (MwSt.) We deliever only by DHL Go Green. Shipping Costs: To Germany: 4,50 € International and EU-wide shipment costs, consultate _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Info From Seller_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; below. Search your country in the lists to find out your shipment costs. If you have questions, just contact us via BGG. International dispatch can contain additonal taxes and custom fees. Payment Method: PayPal To Adress: Info@badlands-shop.de Bank Transfer Without any fees from our side as long as you use SEPA from an EU State to our IBAN/BIC Account: Applegate _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Jost GbR Sparkasse KölnBonn IBAN: DE34 3705 0198 1932 8477 99 BIC: COLSDE33xxx We recommend an Euro donated Account, because of lower fees. To see our terms and conditions (AGB, Widerrufsbelehrung), visit http://www.badlands-shop.de/j/shop/terms and www.badlands-shop.de/j/shop/withdrawal. We are a german Online Shop, so the text will be in german language. If you still have questions, feel free to email them to info@badlands-shop.de.
